  • Classes in org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.statistics used by org.locationtech.geowave.adapter.raster.adapter 
    Class and Description
    DefaultStatisticsProvider
    This interface can be used with data type adapters and indices so that default statistics will be added to the data store when the adapter/index is added.
  • Classes in org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.statistics used by org.locationtech.geowave.adapter.raster.plugin 
    Class and Description
    DataStatisticsStore
    This is responsible for persisting data statistics (either in memory or to disk depending on the implementation).
  • Classes in org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.statistics used by org.locationtech.geowave.adapter.raster.stats 
    Class and Description
    StatisticsIngestCallback
    Interface for statistics that support updates when an entry is ingested.
    StatisticsRegistrySPI
    Base SPI for registered statistics.
    StatisticsRegistrySPI.RegisteredBinningStrategy
    This class contains everything needed to register a statistic binning strategy with GeoWave.
    StatisticsRegistrySPI.RegisteredStatistic
    This class contains everything needed to register a statistic with GeoWave.
  • Classes in org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.statistics used by org.locationtech.geowave.adapter.vector 
    Class and Description
    DefaultStatisticsProvider
    This interface can be used with data type adapters and indices so that default statistics will be added to the data store when the adapter/index is added.

    This is responsible for persisting data statistics (either in memory or to disk depending on the implementation).

    This class serves as the base implementation for a statistic type, based on ByteArray.

  • Classes in org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.statistics used by org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.index 
    Class and Description
    DefaultStatisticsProvider
    This interface can be used with data type adapters and indices so that default statistics will be added to the data store when the adapter/index is added.
  • Classes in org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.statistics used by org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.metadata 
    Class and Description
    DataStatisticsStore
    This is responsible for persisting data statistics (either in memory or to disk depending on the implementation).
    StatisticId
    A unique identifier for a statistic.
    StatisticType
    This class serves as the base implementation for a statistic type, based on ByteArray.
    StatisticUpdateCallback
    This class is responsible for managing updates to a set of statistics for a given type and index.
    StatisticValueWriter
    Writes statistic values to the data store using a given metadata writer.
  • Classes in org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.statistics used by org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.operations 
    Class and Description
    DataStatisticsStore
    This is responsible for persisting data statistics (either in memory or to disk depending on the implementation).
  • Classes in org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.statistics used by org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.statistics 
    Class and Description
    DataStatisticsStore
    This is responsible for persisting data statistics (either in memory or to disk depending on the implementation).
    StatisticId
    A unique identifier for a statistic.
    StatisticsRegistry
    Singleton registry for all supported statistics.
    StatisticsRegistrySPI
    Base SPI for registered statistics.
    StatisticsRegistrySPI.RegisteredBinningStrategy
    This class contains everything needed to register a statistic binning strategy with GeoWave.
    StatisticsRegistrySPI.RegisteredStatistic
    This class contains everything needed to register a statistic with GeoWave.
    StatisticType
    This class serves as the base implementation for a statistic type, based on ByteArray.
    StatisticUpdateCallback
    This class is responsible for managing updates to a set of statistics for a given type and index.
    StatisticValueWriter
    Writes statistic values to the data store using a given metadata writer.
  • Classes in org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.statistics used by org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.statistics.adapter

    Interface for statistics that support updates when an entry is deleted.

    Interface for statistics that support updates when an entry is ingested.
